pkgmetadata.longdescription: Score and Plot the Healthy Eating Index from NHANES Data // Calculate and visualize Healthy Eating Index (HEI) scores from National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey 24-hour dietary recall data utilizing three methods recommended by the National Cancer Institute (2024) https://epi.grants.cancer.gov/hei/hei-methods-and-calculations. html#:~:text=To%20use%20the%20simple%20HEI,the%20total%20scores %20across%20individuals.. Effortlessly analyze HEI scores across different demographic groups and years.
